sections.heading: Overview
content:
Ernest Newbrun, DMD, PhD, is a professor emeritus of oral biology and
periodontology in the department of stomatology at the University of
California, San Francisco (UCSF). He received his bachelor of dental surgery
from the University of Sydney, his master of science from the University of
Rochester, and his doctor of dental medicine from the University of Alabama in
Birmingham. He obtained a PhD and specialty training in periodontology at UCSF.
Since 1981 he has limited his clinical practice to periodontology.
